EmailTemplate.name: PRM Individual User Enablement Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Individual User Enablement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.Name},
Welcome to Office Depot's Partner Exchange. The ODPEX provides everything you will need to be a successful partner with Office Depot; including marketing materials, training, lead registration and escalation paths. If at any point in this process, you have questions, please reach out to channel support: channelsupport@officedepot.com. We are happy to help.
To get you started, we have attached a “How To Guide” highlighting the key features of the ODPEX Portal.
Click here to reset your password for {!Community_Name}.
Thanks,
Channel Support.
